metadata.title: CVE-2017-8787 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The PoDoFo::PdfXRefStreamParserObject::ReadXRefStreamEntry function inbase/PdfXRefStreamParserObject.cpp:224 in PoDoFo 0.9.5 allows remoteattackers to cause a denial of service (heap-based buffer over-read) orpossibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted PDF file.

criterions.comment: libpodofo package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
